# AppName: # This config is used to monitor application installations based on /var/log/install.log
# - AppName: Must match the title in swiftdialog.json
# - StartPatterns and SuccessPatterns: semicolon-separated regex strings
# - Regexes are matched against install.log using grep -F
# - Leading/trailing semicolons are allowed and stripped
# - The monitoring script supports parallel checks and retries
# Company Portal: Detects start by script log lines
# Microsoft Office 365: Looks for OneDrive.pkg extraction or Word install as start; finishes when all main apps are touched

SuccessPatterns: Application was installed at: file:///Applications/Microsoft%20Word.app;Application was installed at: file:///Applications/Microsoft%20Excel.app;Application was installed at: file:///Applications/Microsoft%20PowerPoint.app;Application was installed at: file:///Applications/Microsoft%20OneNote.app;Application was installed at: file:///Applications/Microsoft%20Outlook.app;Application was installed at: file:///Applications/Microsoft%20Teams.app;Application was installed at: file:///Applications/OneDrive.app
